author: Staff Reporter
text:
A flying squad of Civil Supplies Department seized 250 kg of sugar meant for Public Distribution System (PDS) near Chunkankadai on the Nagercoil-Thiruvananthapuram National Highway around 6 a.m. on Thursday.

According to Special Tahsildar M. Ignatius Xavier, the team was checking vehicles and intercepted a passenger autorickshaw near Parvathipuram.

When the driver did not stop it, the officials chased the vehicle for one-and-a-half km and stopped it.

Ten bags of sugar were found stashed under the seats.

While the driver escaped, the auto was seized and the sugar handed over to the TNCSC godown.
title: Flying squad seizes 250 kg of PDS sugar
